local_intent: Ensure grape is visible, move to pregrasp above it, perform fine ApproachAndAlign (0.005 tol), then verify at target.
assumptions: Target grape is localizable via ScanForTarget
Pregrasp above target is reachable without collisions
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT detection fallback (spiral scan), uses MoveAbove then ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.005 and timeout 1200, and verifies pose with IsAt.
